name: WaKa
description:
This is a very quick arcade game clone made for RMN.

Highscores are enabled if you have a HBGames account - visit www.arpgmaker.com for more info.

Credits

Graphics: Ellie

Audio: Defrini (Free Music Archive)

Engine: RPG Maker MV Developer: Ellie for HBGames

WaKa WaKa voice: Illy

WaKa persona: WaKa

Esby persona: Esby
